page.title: 05Clubs in Pennington
page.content: Every two weeks some of the older children in Pennington go the youth group.We play volleyball,snooker, Australian netball and we listen to records.Sometimes we have a disco.The "Chit Chat"is a newspaper produced by a group of people to inform villagers about the local news and let them know what is happening in the future.It has been produced for two years.It comes out every month. On Saturday afternoons,children and adults go to the Archery Club.The club has revived recently and it has produced some champions.Members have entered competitions locally and in Lancashire. There are many other clubs like the "Over 60's",the Mothers Union,the Beavers,Sunday School.At the social- club they play,football,darts,archery, cricket,card games and pool.
